summary: Adds a Kunai (weapon type: dagger) to the iron weapon branch.
descriptionHtml:
Kunai (weapon type: dagger)

Installation:

Copy meshes + textures folder & KUNAI.esp to your Skyrim\\data directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\weapons\\KUNAI\\ ALL NIF FILES
... Skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\KUNAI\\ ALL DDS FILES
... Skyrim\\data\\KUNAI.esp

Make sure that the plugin is activated in launcher => DATA FILES.
The weapon is placed in the forge-menu along with the iron items.

Or open console (key ^) and enter HELP KUNAI 4
You get a code, after that enter PLAYER.ADDITEM CODE 1
(1 = amount) - the weapon will be placed in your inventory.

Damage should scale with your skills/lvl, if you want to adjust the dmg open the Creation Kit,
LOAD, check SKYRIM.ESM and KUNAI.ESP in the left window, set KUNAI.ESP to ACTIVE FILE and
press OK. In the object window check ITEMS and WEAPONS, search for KUNAI and open the found form, 
adjust the dmg/speed values in this window, press OK and SAVE.

greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
